\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&,column sep=tiny]
	{d\binom xy} \& {=} \& {\binom x {dy}} \& {+} \& {(-1)^p\binom{dx}y} \\
	{d\binom yx} \& {=} \& {(-1)^q\binom{dy}x} \& {+} \& {\binom y{dx}}
	\arrow["{\varepsilon (p,q)}"', maps to, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon (p,q+1)}", maps to, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon (p+1,q)}", maps to, from=1-5, to=2-5]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
